author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 30-day free training on apparel designing for rural poor will be conducted by the Indian Bank Self Employment TrainingInstitute (INDSETI) here.

A press release said that the training would cove designing various dress materials for children and women, school children an for men. Women who had passed Standard 8 and are in the age group of 21 to 4 years are eligible. Interested can contact, INDSETI, Second Floor, 3/151, Ravin Plaza, Trichy Main Road, Near Railway Over Bridge, Namakkal 637-001, 04286-221004 or 94432-40899.
title: Training in apparel designing
